_source.text: Actually, another way in which it has sort of dated is in terms of certain actors now being better known for other things: in particular, Sarandon is better known to genre fans as bad Prince Humperdinck in The Princess Bride , and it's hard to Amy seriously when she's played by psycho neighbour Marcy from Married With Children ...
